description: Toonie Tours is Canada's largest Free Walking Tour network. We welcome and connect customers to Canada through high-quality tours & experiences with passionate and personable freelance guides. Toonie Tours is best known for its Free Walking Tours that provide a lay of the land, an introduction to the city, and local recommendations from the unique perspective of a local guide.

reviews.title: Top Toonies!
text: Small group of us so we got a great experience and fun trip lead by Maria.
Well paced and covered a good area which helped for the rest of the trip.

reviews.title: Great tour. Would recommend.
text: My friend and I booked with Trip Advisors the Toronto tip based walking tour by Toonie Tours. Our guide was Maria. The appox.  3 hr. Tour took us to many parts of downtown Toronto including the old town, financial district and entertainment areas. Maria was very informative about the history and fun facts of the city. The walking pace was easy and there were many places for photo opportunities. Would recommend anyone visiting the city to take this tour as the information will help you to get around the city easier.

reviews.title: Really professional, informative and entertaining tour.
text: Very professional tour. The guide (Wei Ting) knew his stuff and the tour was very informative and well structured. In addition he had a good sense of humour, delivery style and empathy for the group.

reviews.title: Great Tour
text: Our guide gave us a great tour of Toronto, which gave us great ideas for the rest of our stay. Also gave us a great bot of the history of the city. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Good introduction
text: Good introduction to areas of Toronto.  Guide had a lot of knowledge.  However I felt he could have interacted with the group more.  There was no conversation while we waited he sat looking at his phone.

reviews.title: Great tour
text: Such a good walking tour!! Maya was amazing and knew a lot about the city, great way to start our time in Toronto!! Can‚Äôt wait to do all her recommendations üëå

reviews.title: Great to get to know Toronto
text: Was a great tour! And although we were only 3 people, our guide did the tour nonetheless. Was very informative with a lot of interesting fun facts.

reviews.title: Nice person
text: Really good guide, nice person. Nice conversation and understandable. He solved all questions and went at a good pace.

reviews.title: Nice intro to the area
text: Our tour guide Maya was friendly, energetic, and informative.  We covered a lot of ground (around 10,000 steps) and learned a lot about the history and architecture of the area. I would recommend Toonie Tours if you‚Äôre in the area!

reviews.title: Toronto walking tour
text: This was a brilliant way to look round the city of Toronto. Elizabeth was a great host, took us to places that we wouldn‚Äôt have found, very informative & enjoyable. The 3 hours went very quickly and the balance of walking and talking was just about spot on. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.title: Tour with Mara in Toronto.
text: The journey was amazing especially with are tour guide Maria. She was very nice and funny and taught historical facts and stories. Maria took us to many interesting places and explained  all of them in good detail so everyone understood.

reviews.title: Best walking tour of Toronto
text: When ever I arrive in Canada I always look for Toonie tours, the best tours around. Our guide was Joul Torontos finest! very knowledgeable great fun and facts with trivia you won‚Äôt be disappointed! Super tour of the city thank you Joul

reviews.title: Excellent Experience would do it again!
text: Tour guide Joel was excellent. His knowledge of the city was amazing. He was engaging and made the tour fun. My 17 year old loved it

reviews.title: Scooters are a great way to see a city!
text: This was such a great way to get a sense of the city and not have to look at a map once! The scooters were easy to operate and the tour guide, Joelle, was fun and friendly! He made it feel like we were just scootering around with a friend who was excited to share fun facts about their city.

reviews.title: Aug City Trip
text: Mya was an excellent guide. Knowledgable, informative and not too serious! Have us a great understanding of the city..

reviews.title: Great tour guide
text: Maria from Macao was an amazing tour guide, and made the tour very interesting. Do not book it through any provider as it's free through the Toonie tours website

reviews.title: Lovely way to spend a morning in Toronto
text: This is a lovely way to get a sense of Toronto. Our guide Maya was excellent. She was informative and very relaxed and friendly. If you want a little knowledge and insight into Toronto while walking its streets then this is a great tour. It was a lovely way to spend a morning in Toronto and I would definitely recommend it. Thank you Maya!

reviews.title: Fantastic experience!
text: Henry was a fantastic tour guide!
He was knowledgeable and paced our tour appropriately.
We loved seeing the city on scooters.
He gave us ample time to enjoy the neighborhoods and we loved every minute of our trip!

reviews.title: Walk downtown Toronto
text: Well organised walk. Our guide Maria did a good job of explaining various things in an interesting manner. Walking tours always gives us an insight. Had a group and made some new friends. Keep up the good job Toonie Tours. Thanks Maria

reviews.title: Great way to explore Toronto
text: Very good and interesting tour, great value. Joel was a fantastic tour guide - knowledgeable, friendly, funny and an amazing storyteller. I would highly recommend!

reviews.title: Fantastic guide
text: Our guide Rudyard was fantastic. Professional, enthusiastic, knowledgeable. It was impressive how much ground we covered across downtown Toronto and the amount of history and fun facts he packed into every site we stopped at. A lot of walking, make sure to wear comfy shoes, it‚Äôs worth it. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Fun scooter tour
text: Our tour guide was very nice and friendly. He lead us to like 6+ different spots around the city. We stopped and took photos at these spots.
This tour isn‚Äôt for the feign of heart though. You‚Äôll be flying down busy city roads next to cars. It was very exciting but I could see how some people might not be ok with that risk level.
I‚Äôd recommend this tour.

reviews.title: Entertaining tour with lots of history and personal facts
text: Rudyard are was fantastic - a wealth of knowledge and kept the group entertained for 3 hours. We now have a good understanding of Toronto‚Äôs history. Thank you for a wonderful day

reviews.title: Excellent walking Tour
text: Excellent informative tour. Loved every minute of it. the young guide explained a lot of details which we would have missed otherwise.
Fully recommed!

reviews.title: Strolling through the high rises interspersed with pretty park spaces!
text: A fascinating city walking tour that covers the old town and the new and everything in between, but also reveals some of the prettier ‚Äúpark‚Äù developments too.

reviews.title: Great and interesting tour
text: We had a really great tour with the tour guide Maria who was not just very friendly but also quiet funny and telling lots of stories and interesting facts.
We really enjoyed the tour.

reviews.title: Long and fun walk thru Toronto's highlights
text: Maja knows her way around the city. We learned a lot and we're really happy to be have joined.
At almost 8km, the tour is long but never boring!

reviews.title: Brilliant tour
text: Brilliant tour of downtown Toronto. Maya our tour guide was knowledgeable and entertaining.  Found out lots of facts about Toronto that I wouldn't had known walking around on my own. The tour was at a steady pace and not rushed. You must do this tour when in Toronto

reviews.title: Toronto CityTour
text: The tour was very informative and comprehensive. Our guide provided bits of info that we never would have picked up by simply touring on our own. My wife and I really enjoyed the tour and would highly recommend it to visitors of Toronto.

reviews.title: Highly recommend, but watch the time
text: Great tour, informative guide, nice pace, would recommend!  We took the 2:00 on a Thursday. It took us over an hour driving to make the short 1/2 mile back to the expressway. Plan accordingly.

reviews.title: Great tour with Maya!
text: I had originally booked a 2 hr walking tour with a different company, and they canceled.  I was able to book this one and am glad the other co canceled.
Our guide was Maya, and she was great.   I can definitely recommend requesting  her.

reviews.title: Free Tour Toronto
text: We walk around Toronto downtown and I have enjoyed a lot this tour. Dwigth is a really good guide! I recommend this tour for everybody, it is a must if you come to Toronto!

reviews.title: Great tour with Dwight
text: The tour was great! Totally recommended.
Our guide was Dwight, and he gave really cool details about the city. He also recommended nice places to eat and visit

reviews.title: Understood Toronto well.
text: The tour guide was very well prepared and explained history of Toronto excellently.  The tour was insightful and memorable.

reviews.title: 3 hr Toronto walking tour
text: Fabulous experience. Wei Ting was fabulous and informative. Kept us interested from woe to go. Gave us a chance to ask as many questions as we wanted. He didn‚Äôt try to rush through the tour at all. Would definitely recommend this tour to visitors to Toronto

reviews.title: An enjoyable walk through three districts
text: Wei-Ting was a very personable and well-prepared tour guide. He kept us engaged with his multiple-choice questions about Toronto. He was also very willing to answer our questions.

reviews.title: A great tailor-made Toronto tour. Henry was a gem.
text: A Friend scheduled a private tour of Toronto. She told Toonie Tours Toronto about our general interests and tour preferences. We got what we asked for ‚Ä¶ a tour curated to local architecture, history, and graffiti. Henry said it wasn‚Äôt his standard tour - but it was clear that he did a lot of homework. He even had old photos of the things we saw, so that we had then-and-now visuals. He was full of facts, affable, a great guide.

reviews.title: Thorough three hour walking tour of Toronto
text: Excellent three hour plus walking tour with extremely knowledgeable and witty host Rudyard.  Be prepared to get your steps in.  Definitely recommended for history buffs.

reviews.title: Toronto 3 hour walking tour
text: I think our guid's name was Win. He did a great job explaining the sites, walked at a good pace that worked for all. He was very personable. we were very pleased.

reviews.title: A must do intro to Toronto
text: We arrived in Toronto feeling overawed by the size of the city. We booked this tour as a way of orientating ourselves, and were massively impressed. Our guide, Henry, explained the history and culture of the city during our tour as well as pointing out many interesting features and great spots to take pictures. Doing this tour changed our views of Toronto and gave us practical suggestions for spending our time here - it's a fantastic way of starting your time in the city as it makes it relatable and understandable. Would strongly recommend as an introduction to a great place that can be difficult to relate to if you experience it cold.
